name: arkui_noninterop_tools
description: transform arkui sdk for ArkTS1.2 interop

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.test:build: npm run test:clean && npm run test:compile
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run test:build
scripts.sample: npm run sample:clean && npm run test:build && node "dist-test/test/testSample.js"
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run test:clean && npm run sample:clean && rimraf node_modules
